snippet: There is disagreement among Republicans about whether they should focus efforts to win a Senate majority on the president’s perceived incompetence.
abstract: Political Memo; Republicans disagree about whether they should focus efforts to win a Senate majority on Pres Obama's perceived incompetence; some Republicans are expressing opinion that Obama's competence is not the defining issue of upcoming midterm elections, and not much of an issue at all except among conservatives who have never liked him.
lead_paragraph: There is disagreement among Republicans about whether they should focus efforts to win a Senate majority on the president’s perceived incompetence.

headline.main: While Some in G.O.P. See Obama’s Competence as Rich Vein to Mine, Others See Little Reward
headline.print_headline: While Some in G.O.P. See Obama’s Competence as Rich Vein to Mine, Others See Little Reward
